Song of Radiant Dawn.name: Song of Radiant Dawn
Song of Radiant Dawn.flavor: Your enemy cannot bear the bold song you sing and recoils as light suffuses its being.
Song of Radiant Dawn.onHit: 1d6 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, push the target 1 square, and each time the target takes damage from an attack before the start of your next turn, it takes an extra 5 radiant damage.

Psalm of Succor.name: Psalm of Succor
Psalm of Succor.flavor: Your joyful song calls forth heavensâ€™ bountiful gifts and gives your allies a sense of peace and tranquility.
Psalm of Succor.target: You and each ally in the burst
Psalm of Succor.effect: You and each ally in the burst can spend a healing surge. The burst becomes a zone of healing energy that lasts until the end of your next turn. While you are within the zone, you and each ally in the zone gains resist 10 necrotic damage and a +2 bonus to saving throws to end ongoing damage.

Brilliant Symphony.name: Brilliant Symphony
Brilliant Symphony.flavor: Your sonorous voice awakens thoughts of vengeance and justice in those who hear you.
Brilliant Symphony.onHit: The target chooses to become dominated until the end of your next turn or stunned (save ends). You or an ally in the burst gains 20 temporary hit points.
Brilliant Symphony.onMiss: The target chooses to become dazed (save ends) or make a melee basic attack against one enemy of its choice within its reach. You or an ally in the burst gains 10 temporary hit points.
